description: This file defines API routes related to 'connections', including endpoints to list active connections, register webhooks, delete webhooks, and add comments. It uses FastAPI for web routing and depends on core modules for tenant context and token storage.

methods.name: list_connections(tenant: TenantContext = Depends(tenant_dep))
methods.description: Returns a list of active connections for a tenant, fetching data from an in-memory token store.

methods.name: register_webhook(connector_id: str, tenant: TenantContext = Depends(tenant_dep))
methods.description: Stub endpoint to register a webhook for a specific connection.

methods.name: delete_webhook(connector_id: str, webhook_id: str, tenant: TenantContext = Depends(tenant_dep))
methods.description: Stub endpoint to delete a webhook for a specific connection.

methods.name: add_comment(connector_id: str, item_id: str, tenant: TenantContext = Depends(tenant_dep))
methods.description: Stub endpoint to add a comment to an item related to a connection.

ctags.name: add_comment
ctags.pattern: /^def add_comment(connector_id: str, item_id: str, tenant: TenantContext = Depends(tenant_dep)):$/
ctags.signature: (connector_id: str, item_id: str, tenant: TenantContext = Depends(tenant_dep))

ctags.name: delete_webhook

ctags.signature: (connector_id: str, webhook_id: str, tenant: TenantContext = Depends(tenant_dep))
